Bug.messageLength: The message must be at least 50 characters
Bug.sent: Your message has been sent successfully. We will respond as soon as possible by email
Bug.wait: Please wait a minute before sending a new bug report.

EndSubscriptionMail.subject: Muonium - Your subscription ends in less than [days] days
EndSubscriptionMail.message:
Hi [login],
This email is sent because your subscription ends in less than [days] days.
Muonium Team

InactiveUserMail.subject: Muonium - You are inactive
InactiveUserMail.message:
Hi [login],
This email is sent because you are inactive for [inactiveDays] days.
Your account will be deleted in [deleteDelay] days if you don't log in
Muonium Team

Error.pp: Editing the secret password is not currently available

Global.mailSent: An email was sent to you, please check your mailbox and your spams. If you received nothing after 5 minutes, please try again:

shortcuts: • Left click on a file/folder: Select a file/folder - View details
• Ctrl + Arrow up: Add previous file to selection
• Ctrl + Arrow down: Add next file to selection

Best regards,
Muonium Team

LostPass.keyErr: Error: The key is wrong or expired, please make a new request.
LostPass.message:
Hi,
To update your password or secret password, please follow this link: [url_app]/#/lostPass/[id_user]/[key]
Best regards,
Muonium Team.

This email was automatically generated, please do not answer.

LostPass.updateOk: Your account information have been successfully updated.

Best regards,
Muonium Team
